intro: Psychotria beccarioides, commonly known as the Beccarioides Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces berries that are typically red when mature, containing minute seeds. Psychotria beccarioides is often found in humid, shaded environments within lowland rainforests.
